name: griddify
description: A tiny photoshop panel to make guides and grids

scripts.winwatch: start/b jitter scripts/coffee scripts/js -b && start/b compass watch styles && start/b watchify scripts/js/panel/panel.js --path js --noparse=FILE --dg false -o scripts/dist/panel.js -v && start/b watchify scripts/js/commands/commands.js --path js --noparse=FILE --dg false -o scripts/dist/commands.jsx -v
scripts.watch: jitter scripts/coffee scripts/js -b & compass watch styles & watchify scripts/js/panel/panel.js --path js --noparse=FILE --dg false -o scripts/dist/panel.js -v & watchify scripts/js/commands/commands.js --path js --noparse=FILE --dg false -o scripts/dist/commands.jsx -v

author: Aria Minaei
